oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Compact broadband gap-coupled shorted L-shaped microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESHMUKH, AA
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: c-shaped microstrip antenna
shorted l-shaped microstrip antenna
compact microstrip antenna
gap-coupled microstrip antenna
broadband microstrip antenna
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A compact variation of a C-shaped microstrip antenna, that is, a shorted L-shaped microstrip antenna, is proposed. Several suspended multiresonator gap-coupled shorted L-shaped configurations have been proposed to obtain wide bandwidth and high gain. (c) 2005 .
